be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user

Class ProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user.ProfileController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditProfileViewController.Listener, ProfileViewController.Listener

    public class ProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProfileViewController.Listener, EditProfileViewController.Listener
    The profile controller class handle all the data of the user's profile (username, firstname, lastname, email, password). It is possible to edit the profile with the EditProfileController class once the user wants to change his data profile.
